text_block_list.text: 『Together with you,I'm going to Dubai』……it had been a few weeks since I heard those shocking words. Now I was here at this mock race. And the reason was――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ――Trainer-san, do you want to form a contract with me? And then, you can take me to Dubai♪

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm……wait a moment, Vivlos? I don't think it's possible but, you didn't think of that just now did you?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: No way~! You're wrong! Besides, Trainer-san is a really nice person, you know?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: They stayed with me the whole time I was shopping. I reeeeally love kind people like Trainer-san♪

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: I apologize Trainer-san, I'll be sure to talk to her about this later…… You see Vivlos, trainers are――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: It's fine, I know already! Trainer-san, I think I want someone like you!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: I just told you? You're a nice person!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: For me, something like that is super important! Isn't that fine? There's all kinds of evaluation critera, after all!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: But, you probably don't know if I'd be a good pick, right? Then, would you come watch the next mock race?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely make you think I'm good. Bye bye for today, let's play again soon, okay? Onee-chan, let's go get food!
――I was invited directly by an Uma Musume, so there was no reason not to attend. I was really curious about her abilities after all, but the first thing I wanted to know……
When thinking of Dubai, it was a country that hosted several international G1s. They were high-level races where some of the best Uma Musume in the world gathered.
In recent years, there have been several Japanese Uma Musume who have won for the first time in a while. Dubai races have also been garnering more attention domestically.
If Vivlos really wants to race in Dubai, then as a trainer, it would be a real honor to challenge that together with her. But――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah! So you really came, huh!? Heeey, Tore-cchi♪
……for some reason, she was acting like we were really close now. The reason someone as young as this would already be aiming for Dubai……there had to be some reason.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: I'll be doing my real best! So don't miss a thing, okay? Make sure you're only looking at me~!
And then, the mock race that Vivlos was participating in began, however――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hm-hmmm♪
Vivlos had a good start and entered the leading group. Her race instincts seemed to be good and she seemed to know which position was most advantageous for her.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ehehee, they're looking, they're looking……♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Then, I'll need to show them more of my good points, huh!? Yaaaaaaaaaa♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ehehee, Tore-cchi~~~~! I'm amazing, aren't Iーーーー!
As she pushed through the other Uma Musume in the straight, she took a dominant position. It was no contest――
Depending on how she was taught, she could grow immensely. Thinking like that, as a trainer, I couldn't help but get excited――

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ――Vivlos has always been like that.
Suddenly, Verxina's little sister was next to me―― In other words, Vivlos' other big sister, Cheval Grand.
She was currently running in the Twinkle Series. She didn't have any notable results yet, but there was potential in her.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: With her sense she's had since birth, she could do anything. Compared to someone clumsy like me, she's completely different……

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ……! Ah, s-sorry……!
……I wanted to ask her about Vivlos, but it seems I scared her. And that's when――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Tore-cchi~~~~! You were talking with Chevacchi just now weren't you!?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Did she say anthing about me? Did she talk about me!? Did she praise me?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: …… Chevacchi was…… ……Ehehee♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: And so, Tore-cchi? My running was good wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ain't that right~♪ Then, you'll be my trainer right?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Still a no? A trainer's job is to help an Uma Musume win, right? If I already know how to run well, isn't that perfect?
choice_data_list: But I don't know anything about you
But I don't know anything about you

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm~…… Tore-cchi, what do you want to know?
After seeing her abilities, the other thing I wanted to know about was her "dream". Like what was she aiming for, why was she running? The only keyword was……
choice_data_list: You're aiming to race in Dubai?
You're aiming to race in Dubai?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right! Running in that race is my dream!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: You've seen races in Dubai, right? They're so sparkly, and there are so many Celebs, right? It's the best~

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ……Eh, yeah! That's it, I guess……?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer-san, you want to know more right? You can ask me anything! Ah, but who I like is~ a secret♡
choice_data_list: (I know her dream, then after this……)

text_block_list.text: I can tell she has talent, but talent alone won't get her to Dubai. Until I knew how I was going to guide her, I'd have to think about it, so I couldn't sign a contract yet.
choice_data_list: Sorry, I need to think this through!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Eh.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh!? But whyyy~~~~!?
